Articles.Content:
Never. Just never.

So, noone's hill.
Ok then. Still My hill.

I asked for the hill in Jeb's Diner.

My hill.
I ask for the hill in Kafé Perseverance. My hill.

Both claims are rejected.

Unpossessed hill.
I walk up and take it. My hill. also buy up Café Perseverance and put it on the hill. My hill and Moneymaking restaurant.

After three years of deliberation with the government, I bulldoze your restaurant and build a multi-storey car park in its place.

My government-funded hill.
I blow up your hill, with you on it and fill it in and take it. My hill.
You don't have a license to blow up hills. The unlicensed blowuphilling is strictly prohibited.

> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> You don't have a license to blow up hills. The unlicensed blowuphilling is strictly prohibited.
> 

I get a license and blow it up again. MY HILL

But once you already have told that had blown it up.  

And now again? The same hill?

So, your hill declarations are recognized as fake news and ignored.
SHUT UP. My hill.

It's easy to recognize the signs of despair in your capsing.  

Deep in your mind you understand, that the hill is not yours.
I take it. My hill.

As you take it, that means it wasn't yours before.  

So, all your previous claims were false.  

Why this one wouldn't?
SHUTUP NAO My hill.

I have a hillblowuping license.

Hill Empire

DOB: March 12, 2044, K.C.E.

Name, Last: Kerman Name, first: Hanson Middle Initial: B

License to blow up hills

So I blow up the hill that [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) is trying to claim. Unpossesed hill.

The Hill Empire conquers it. The Hill Empire's hill.
I take the hill by attacking it from a neighboring hill. My hillie!
Darn it.
Yes. xD
The dam gets busted. The hill is washed away.
I rebuild the hill not near water and take it. My hillie!
The hill is covered with sand and lost.

The hill **IS** the sand

My sand mound.
I move the hill and take it. My hill.
